sense.def:
Kadar led ali sneg
thaws
, se topi.

seg.quote: The snow soon thawed and they all went out for a walk.
The ice was thawed by the warm wind.

sense.def:
A thaw
je obdobje toplejšega vremena, ko se sneg in led topita.

seg.quote: A thaw had set in and the streets were slushy.

sense.def:
To thaw frozen food
pomeni pustiti zamrznjeno hrano nekje, kjer se ogreje, tako da jo lahko uporabimo.

seg.quote: Unwrap the pastry and then thaw it overnight.

sense.def:
Kadar ljudje ali odnosi, ki prej niso bili prijateljski,
thaw
, postanejo prijaznejši.

seg.quote: The Vatican indicated that it might be thawing and accepting the critics' argument.
A similar invitation thawed Jimmy Carter in 1979.
